TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProfileModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileModule Implements IHttpModule
public ref class ProfileModule sealed : System::Web::IHttpModule

summary.span: 管理使用者設定檔的建立和設定檔事件。

span.span: Manages the creation of the user profile and profile events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用使用者設定檔時，ASP.NET 會使用建立使用者設定檔，並將其儲存在屬性與目前。When the user profile is enabled, ASP.NET uses the to create the user profile and store it in the property of the current . 公開 （expose) 您可以控制代碼，以在您的應用程式中設定驗證的下列事件：The exposes the following events you can handle to configure authentication in your application: - 事件，移轉設定檔設定從匿名設定檔，已驗證的設定檔的匿名使用者登入時。The event, to migrate profile settings from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when an anonymous user logs in. - 事件，以自訂使用者設定檔的建立方式。The event, to customize how the user profile is created. - 事件，來控制使用者設定檔已儲存的時機屬性設定為`true`。The event, to control how the user profile is saved when the property is set to `true`. 啟用使用者設定檔的相關資訊，請參閱[profile 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd)。For information about enabling the user profile, see [profile Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ccb9bf3a-a044-464d-b89b-5cb5a3d389dd). ## Examples 下列範例示範 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名識別和支援匿名使用者的設定檔屬性。The following example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件將設定檔屬性值從匿名的設定檔複製到目前使用者的設定檔。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時建立。An is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 呼叫建構函式建立應用程式。The calls the constructor to create the for the application. 應用程式組態中所指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時建立。An is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 建立並初始化的應用程式和呼叫方法時釋放物件。The creates and initializes the for the application and calls the method when the object is released. 應用程式組態中所指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時建立。An is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 呼叫方法時，它會建立應用程式。The calls the method when it creates the for the application. 應用程式組態中所指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MigrateAnonymous As ProfileMigrateEventHandler

summary.span: 當設定檔的匿名使用者登入時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the anonymous user for a profile logs in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以存取事件的您的 ASP.NET 應用程式，利用 Global.asax 檔案中的類別`Profile_MigrateAnonymous`全域的事件，如本主題的範例所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application by using the `Profile_MigrateAnonymous` global event, as shown in the example for this topic. 您可以使用事件，以複製設定檔屬性值從匿名設定檔的已驗證的設定檔已以匿名方式使用您的應用程式的使用者登入時。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when a user who has been anonymously using your application logs in. 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，ASP.NET 會建立新類別的型別`ProfileCommon`，該項則繼承自類別。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會新增至`ProfileCommon`組態區段中定義的每一個屬性的類別。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. A`GetProfile`方法可讓您擷取`ProfileCommon`物件會根據使用者名稱。A `GetProfile` method enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 您可以使用`GetProfile`目前已經過驗證設定檔，以擷取匿名的設定檔的屬性值的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current, authenticated profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 匿名的屬性值可以再複製到目前已驗證之使用者的設定檔。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下列範例示範 Web.config 檔案，可讓匿名識別和支援匿名使用者的設定檔屬性。The following example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件將設定檔屬性值從匿名的設定檔複製到目前使用者的設定檔。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Personalize As ProfileEventHandler

summary.span: 在使用者設定檔建立之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the user profile is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間引發事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 您可以存取事件的您 ASP.NET 應用程式使用 Global.asax 檔案中的類別`Profile_Personalize`全域的事件，如本主題的範例所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_Personalize` global event as shown in the example for this topic. 您可以使用來指定自訂使用者設定檔的事件。You can use the event to specify a custom user profile. 如果指定的屬性值事件處理常式事件設定為值不是`null`時事件才會結束，則會使用指定的值屬性的值屬性與目前。If the property value specified for the event handler for the event is set to a value that is not `null` when the event ends, then the will use the specified value of the property as the value of the property of the current . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中宣告事件。The following code example shows the event declared in the Global.asax file for an application. 事件程式碼會載入根據角色成員資格使用者的使用者設定檔。The event code loads a user profile for a user based on role membership. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize/CS/global.asax#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Personalize/VB/global.asax#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ProfileAutoSaving As ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler

summary.span: 在頁面執行結束時發生 (如果自動設定檔儲存已啟用)。

span.span: Occurs at the end of page execution if automatic profile saving is enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在頁面執行結束時引發事件屬性是`true`。The event is raised at the end of page execution if the property is `true`. 您可以存取事件的您 ASP.NET 應用程式使用 Global.asax 檔案中的類別`Profile_ProfileAutoSaving`全域的事件，如本主題的範例所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_ProfileAutoSaving` global event, as shown in the example for this topic. 方法會檢查屬性值，每個使用者設定檔，以判斷屬性是否組成基本型別、 字串或物件已變更。The method checks the property value for each in the user profile to determine whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed. 方法無法明確判斷是否已變更的自訂類別。The method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed. 您可以使用事件來判斷是否已變更的自訂物件，然後繼續進行自動儲存修改過的物件，或取消自動儲存，如果沒有任何物件已經被修改。You can use the event to determine whether a custom object has been changed and then either to continue with the automatic save for modified objects or to cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 若要取消儲存作業的自動設定檔，設定屬性，以`false`中事件; 否則，請設定屬性設`true`。To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the property to `false` in the event; otherwise, set the property to `true`. 可能有多個訂閱者事件。There may be multiple subscribers to the event. 會使用最後一個值屬性設定為。The will use the last value that the property is set to. 如此一來，建議明確設定屬性中的事件是否要取消或繼續進行自動儲存，因為您可能需要覆寫先前的訂閱者所設定的值。As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the property in the event whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中所包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/CS/global.asax#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.ProfileAutoSaving/VB/global.asax#11)]
